The following is a brief and fairly candid record of some of the interesting discussion topics and key take home messages and insights from last months innovation event.

The panel was deftly chaired by Rob Hoffman, Vice Chair of Young Engineers Australia Queensland starting 5 minutes early and finished on time with the sudden chatter that followed indicative of the success of the evening at provoking the kind of thought and discussion it had intended.
